alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Surf Warning issued December 09 at 6:59PM PST until December 10 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves of 20 to 25 ft. * WHERE...South Central Oregon Coast and Curry County Coast. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Extremely large breaking waves will create very hazardous conditions along beaches and area shorelines. Waves will inundate beaches and surge into normally dry areas. Infrastructure damage and significant beach erosion can be expected. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Beaches and coastlines will become hazardous due to very large and life-threatening surf conditions. Stay off of beaches, rocks, jetties,piers, and other waterside infrastructure.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
